amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike the $500,000 earmark for the Ethanol from Agriculture project.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in Part C of House Report 111-209 to strike $500,000 in funding for `Ethanol from Agriculture' and reduce the overall cost of the bill by a commensurate amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A015) Failed by recorded vote: 102 - 318 (Roll no. 584).
